item.title: Fed Pushback on Easing Outlook Would Upend Bullish Bets
item.description: Investors are counting on a dovish message from Jerome Powell.

item.title: Markets Gear Up for Series of Fed Cuts With Bullish Bets at Risk
item.description: A key question for investors this week is whether Federal Reserve officials push back against market bets on a series of interest-rate cuts extending into next year.

item.title: Bullish Treasuries Traders Awaits Jobs Revisions, Inflation Data
item.description: Emboldened investors in the Treasuries market face a test of bullish sentiment this week from inflation reports and a benchmark revisions for jobs data.
